overview_of_class: All Earth and Planetary Sciences Graduate Students must complete the Responsible Conduct of Research (RCR) Training in their first year of the program. This course includes 6 online "CITI" modules as well as discussion sections. New students should contact the Assistant Chair with any questions.
name: Responsible Conduct of Research Training
title: WCAS EARTH 519-0-20 Responsible Conduct of Research Training
